title: NTAuthenticate
name: NTAuthenticate
description: Authenticates a user name and password against the Windows NT domain on which the ColdFusion server is running, and optionally retrieves the user's groups.

attributes.name: domain
attributes.description:
Domain against which to authenticate the user. The
            server must be running on this domain.

attributes.name: result
attributes.description:
Name of the variable in which to return the results.
            Default: cfntauthenticate

attributes.name: listGroups
attributes.description:
Boolean value specifying whether to Include a
            comma-delimited list of the user's groups in the
            result structure.
            Default: false

attributes.name: throwOnError
attributes.description:
Boolean value specifying whether to throw an
            exception if the validation fails. If this attribute is true,
            Lucee throws an error if the user name or password is
            invalid; the application must handle such errors in a
            try/catch block or Lucee error handler page.
            Default: false
